titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 50th anniversary of the Oklahoma Independent Petroleum Association and its members vital contribution to the oil and gas industry of the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 5/26/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates, and recognizes the 50th anniversary of, the Oklahoma Independent Petroleum Association.
